title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 22.4 - Posting notice of regulation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 22.4 - Posting notice of regulation

State Regulations

The director or officer in charge shall conspicuously post
copies of this Part in the general reception room, visiting rooms and
administrative offices of each facility and elsewhere, where it will be seen by
the general public. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
22.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
